channel.title: Blast0Scape
channel.description:
Hi, i am currently creating a server (317), and i would like some help, it will be awhile tell i open this server, im looking for People with the following skills Website designing Coding and some ect maybe I am really looking into this and i dont wanna work alone, no im not a great coder, but if you are apply and it would be nice for some help, but i do want to code it, so i get experience. With website designing i just need someone to help me create a website, and a webclient. I would like to only have on other partner in this maybe 2, In return i will make you Co-Owner of the game. Thank you Application
Name- What do you do(code, website design ect) - With that, what can you do in(code, website design ect) - Email- Anything else you feel like adding that would help you on the team- :D and thats about all i really need to know
